name: SSH Connect Menu
description: This extension puts an icon in the panel with a simple dropdown menu that launches items from your ~.ssh/config. This is a fork of original by Josh Martens (https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/3237/ssh-quick-connect/) for Gnome 40 compatible changes that Josh made but did not upload here for quick/easy install/remove. Besides this description, uuid, name, and version number, no changes were made.
